title: They’re Tasty No Matter What!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Chika-chan, what are these? They’re burnt...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Grilled mikans~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Grilled mikans?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yup! When you grill them, they become super soft and sweet~ Try it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Don’t mind If I do...... Oh, this is delicious! It’s like eating mikan jam!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Right!? Mikans are tasty even when you grill them~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Hmm...... This would also be great as an ice cream or yogurt topping...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>KOTORI-CHAN!!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>What!? What’s wrong!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>That’s a great idea~! Let’s do that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
